metadata.title: CVE-2022-3433 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The aeson library is not safe to use to consume untrusted JSON input. Aremote user could abuse this flaw to produce a hash collision in theunderlying unordered-containers library by sending specially crafted JSONdata, resulting in a denial of service.

criterions.comment: haskell-aeson package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
